command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user XTqR3P9v8tSgKnm.root --database jHCPjtWAoWrQh3F8kPBEFC --execute 
-- 查询当前用户ID
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email = 'runyimacau@gmail.com';

-- 创建测试股票客户
INSERT INTO stockUsers (name, initialBalance, status, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES ('2262Li', '1000000.00', 'active', NOW(), NOW());

-- 获取刚创建的股票客户ID
SET @stockUserId = LAST_INSERT_ID();

-- 为当前用户添加查看权限（假设用户ID为1）
INSERT INTO stockUserPermissions (stockUserId, userId, startAmount, profitPercentage, authorizationDate, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (@stockUserId, 1, '975951.89', 5, '2025-12-29', NOW(), NOW());

-- 添加测试余额记录
INSERT INTO stockBalances (stockUserId, date, balance, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES 
  (@stockUserId, '2025-12-31', '1000000.00', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@stockUserId, '2026-01-05', '1005000.00', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@stockUserId, '2026-01-06', '997518.70', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@stockUserId, '2026-01-07', '1010000.00', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@stockUserId, '2026-01-08', '1015000.00', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@stockUserId, '2026-01-09', '997518.70', NOW(), NOW());

SELECT * FROM stockUsers WHERE id = @stockUserId;
